title: 🏅 Swag Pack Race 🏅
details: I want to run, get some awesome swag with custom artwork by @erinwattsart, and have half of my entry go to support the Monroe County Sheriff's Office Animal Farm.

title: 🐢 Farm Donation Race 🐴
details: I want to race and have all of my entry support the MCSO Animal Farm, don't bother sending me the swag.
